name: The Guardian of Jesi
description:
Join the Guardians of Cola and fight against the evil Chinotto Warrios in an amazing RPG adventure

In an alternative future after-war the world is threatened by the Evil Chinotto Warriors. Travel in more than 10 cities and dozens dungeons in order to beat the evil warriors. Use spells, special skills during the fight!

The Guardian of Jesi is an offline RPG that will involve you in fantasy world ruled by Dragons!
